scenes.background: [Bob] and [Monica] are reviewing your brief feedback in the office. [Monica] seems frustrated.
scenes.description: 'Your review was helpful, but we still need more details. Can you elaborate on this?'

options.text: I can provide more details, but please understand I'm still on leave.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and willingness to help while reminding them of your leave, but your self-regulation and motivation to maintain your boundaries were slightly lower.

options.text: I'll give you a quick explanation, but I need to get back to my leave.
options.analysis: You balanced your time off with a willingness to help, showing good self-regulation, but your motivation and empathy were not particularly high.

options.text: I think the current feedback should be enough. Try to work with what you have.
options.analysis: You showed strong self-regulation by maintaining your boundaries, but your perception, empathy, and motivation to help were lower.
